decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan: EX00. Drawings: EX01,  EX02,  EX03,  EX04,  EX05,  EX06,  EX07,  EX08,  EX09, P01,  P02,  P03,  P04 (A),  P05,  P06,  P07,  P08 (A) and  P09. Received: 03/03/2015.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The windows and door formed in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a part two storey, part single storey rear extension and a side and rear roof extension with roof window to front elevation.
